ai
Class Evaluator

java.lang.Object
  ai.Evaluator
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameTreeEvaluator, RandomEvaluator, RuleBasedEvaluator
abstract class Evaluator
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a method for evaluating a game situation. Is used by the strategy class for the prime evaluation as well as for pre-evaluations for sorting purposes.

Field Summary
(package private)  long passedThinkingTime
          The total passed time that has passed from evaluation start until end.
(package private)  long startTime
          The system time in milliseconds when evaluation starts.
(package private)  Strategy strategy
          The strategy the evaluation method belongs to.

evaluatePosition

abstract java.lang.Double evaluatePosition(Player player,
                                           GameSituation situation,
                                           Position pos)
Evaluates a position in a game situation for the given player.

Parameters:
player - the player for which the position is being evaluated.
situation - the game situation on which evaluation takes place.
pos - the position that is being evaluated.
Returns:
the evaluated value

selectMove

Position selectMove()
Triggers the evaluation process, notes the passing time for evaluation, and returns the move, that has been evaluated as best move.

Returns:
the best evaluated move.

getOneBestPosition

protected Position getOneBestPosition(java.util.List<Position> bestPositions)
Picks one position out of a list of positions. By default the choice is done randomly.

Parameters:
bestPositions - a list of equally evaluated best positions.
Returns:
one best position out of that list.

protected boolean isThreatened(Player player,
                               GameSituation situation,
                               Position pos)
Determines if a position in a situation is threatened by the opponnent of a given player.

Parameters:
player - the player who may be threatened by the opponent.
situation - the game situation the threat is estimated for.
pos - the position where the threat might take place.
Returns:
true, if the position is threatened by the opponent, else false.

isOpponent

protected boolean isOpponent(Player player,
                             GameSituation situation,
                             Position position)
Determines if a position in a situation is occupied by the opponent of a given player.

Parameters:
player - the player for whom it will be determined, if a position is occupied by the opponent
situation - the game situation on which opponent positions will be determined.
position - the position that is being tested for occupation by the opponent.
Returns:
true, if position is occupied by opponent, else false.

hasOpponents

protected boolean hasOpponents(Player player,
                               GameSituation situation,
                               Position pos)
Determines, if a position in a situation has one or more neighbor positions, that are occupied by the opponent.

Parameters:
player - the player for whom it will be determined, if a position has neighbors occupied by the opponent.
situation - the situation on which determination is taking place.
pos - the position for which its neighbors are being estimated.
Returns:
true, if position has neighbors occupied by the opponent, else false.
